abstract: Hundreds of civil lawsuits against Volkswagen over its diesel emission test fraud will be heard by Federal District Court Judge Charles R Breyer in San Francisco, in spite of attempt to send cases to Detroit.
lead_paragraph: The decision came despite a push from the automaker and the federal government to send the cases to Detroit.

headline.main: Hundreds of Volkswagen Suits Will Be Heard in California
headline.print_headline: Hundreds of Volkswagen Suits Will Be Heard in California

snippet: The decision came despite a push from the automaker and the federal government to send the cases to Detroit.
